title: Reroute Traffic for Scheduled Maintenance
description: Before scheduled maintenance on a core router, an agent must proactively reroute traffic to a backup path.

tasks.description: Identify the primary and backup paths for the traffic that traverses the router under maintenance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the network paths.

tasks.description: Execute a command to shift traffic to the backup path.
Verify that no traffic is flowing through the primary router anymore, making it safe for maintenance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the primary path has zero traffic.
